professional.team17.com.professional.Controllers

Class ProviderTaskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • professional.team17.com.professional.Controllers.ProviderTaskController

  • public class ProviderTaskController
extends java.lang.Object
    Provider Task Controller This class is used to help control any Task view for the Provider. It acts as a middle man between the Server and the activity.
    See Also:
    ServerHelper, Task
